Data: Watson to Kamran, no run
Watson to Kamran, 1 run short of a length outside off, cut away down to third man for a single
Watson to Salman Butt, no run bouncer, the first of the day, ducks under it comfortably
Watson to Salman Butt, no run
Watson to Salman Butt, no run short of a length on middle, fends it away into the leg side
Watson to Salman Butt, no run drops it in front of extra cover and calls for a single but is wisely sent back
Hauritz to Kamran, no run short of a length outside off, turning in sharply, makes room to cut it down to point
Hauritz to Kamran, 1 run bends low and paddles it down towards fine leg for a single
Hauritz to Salman Butt, 1 run slightly short on middle, punched down towards mid-on
Hauritz to Kamran, no run short of a length and turning in, tries to chop it into the off side, gets an inside edge just wide of the leg stump
Hauritz to Kamran, 1 run pushed away wide of square leg for a single
Hauritz to Salman Butt, 2 runs quicker through the air from round the wicket, nudges it down behind square towards fine leg for an easy couple
Watson to Kamran, no run bowls it on a good length on the off, defended towards cover from the crease

Watson to Kamran, 1 run short of a length outside off, slashed wide of slip and third man for a single, Hauritz returns an accurate throw from the deep and throws down the stumps at the striker's end, Butt was wise to refuse the second
Watson to Salman Butt, no run banged in short on middle, a bouncer but a harmless one, ducks under
Watson to Salman Butt, 1 run short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot towards third man for a single, Butt decides against the second though it was probably worth going for it

Watson to Kamran, OUT Kamran goes, a needless shot under the circumstances, a slower delivery, a legcutter bowled just outside off, tries to smash him over the in-field on the off side but failed to pick the change in pace and ended up skying it, Clarke and Ponting get underneath it but the deputy calls first and holds on to a well-judged
Watson to Younis, no run bowls it on a good length outside off and gets it to move away, leaves it alone
Hauritz to Salman Butt, 2 runs Butt, though, appears unflustered, slightly short and he slaps it on bended knee towards deep square leg for a couple
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run
Hauritz to Salman Butt, 1 run quicker through the air, bowled short outside off, cut away wide of deep point, there was a second in there but they opt against it
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run Younis off the mark, gets outside the line and tickles it behind square for a single
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run short of a length on the off, taps it in front of cover
Hauritz to Salman Butt, 1 run shortish outside off, swats it wide of cover for an easy single
Watson to Salman Butt, no run lands on a good length on the off, drops it in front of cover, thinks of a single but it's not there

Watson to Salman Butt, 2 runs nicely played, did so really late, short of a good length and he opened the face at just the right time to guide it wide of third man for a couple, McKay does well sliding to his left
Watson to Salman Butt, FOUR runs hurled it short outside off and goes for the favoured cut, gets a thick edge that flies over Haddin to the ropes
Watson to Salman Butt, no run short of a good length on the off, gets an inside edge onto his pad as he tries to play t into the off side
Watson to Salman Butt, 1 run shortish on middle and leg, worked away behind square for a single
Watson to Younis, no run bowled it short on the off, rocks back and knocks it down on the pitch
Siddle to Salman Butt, FOUR runs gave it a good crack, Siddle comes back to bowl it on a length outside off, Butt made room and sliced it over point to the boundary

Siddle to Salman Butt, FOUR runs edged and four! Bowls it on a good length, draws him forward and the movement away produces the outside edge, Cameron White dives valiantly to his left at slip but can't get to it, four more
Siddle to Salman Butt, FOUR runs no respite for Siddle here, Butt's targeting him, short on middle and he was quick to seize the length, hammering it past midwicket for his third consecutive four
Siddle to Salman Butt, no run beaten this time, slightly short on the off and tries to nudge it into the off side, doesn't make contact
Siddle to Salman Butt, no run short of a length on middle, pushed into the off side
Siddle to Salman Butt, no run shortish on middle, worked away into the leg side
Watson to Younis, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, Younis stays back and punches the ball behind point
Watson to Salman Butt, 1 run Butt gets a touch squared up and the outside edge goes towards third man, safely though
Watson to Younis, no run the bouncer at 143.7 kmh, Younis ducks under it
Watson to Younis, no run good length delivery on off stump, Younis defends towards the bowler, that ball hit the shoulder of the bat and then as it came down it hit the blade as well
Watson to Younis, no run fuller length outside off stump, Younis strides forward and plays the ball towards cover
Watson to Younis, no run good length outside off, Younis stays in his crease and plays towards cover again
Siddle to Salman Butt, no run good length ball on off stump, Butt drops the ball towards point and wants the single to reach his half-century, Younis sends him back
Siddle to Salman Butt, 1 run played Butt! He gets to fifty by dabbing the ball towards third man, he's picked up his strike-rate as well, Pakistan need him to go all the way
Siddle to Younis, no run Younis tries to block a good length ball but gets an inside edge on to the pad
Siddle to Younis, no run off the back foot but straight to point, Younis isn't finding timing or placement regularly yet
Siddle to Younis, no run good length and straight, Younis defends towards the bowler
Siddle to Younis, no run beaten! Siddle pitches the ball short of a length outside off, Younis hangs his bat out limply ...
McKay to Salman Butt, 1 run Butt uses the room created by McKay's angle across them to guide the ball to third man
McKay to Younis, 1 run unconvincing but Younis will get a single, he stayed back in his crease and pushed away from his body to play the ball to third man
McKay to Salman Butt, no run McKay appeals but that pitched outside leg stump, Butt tried to flick but missed
McKay to Salman Butt, no run Butt tries to dab the ball to third man again but the fielder at slip is a bit wider and he dives to his left to field the ball
McKay to Salman Butt, no run Butt plays this one to point, there's a been a sudden lull in the scoring
McKay to Salman Butt, no run Butt drops the ball on the off side but there's no quick single available
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run quickish ball on off and middle, Younis leans forward to play it
Hauritz to Salman Butt, 2 runs Butt skips down the pitch, he doesn't get near the bounce of the ball but manages to loft it inside out over extra cover, poor running, they should have got three
Hauritz to Salman Butt, 1 run Butt sweeps and plays it fine on the leg side
Hauritz to Younis, no run Younis tries to sweep but misses it
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run played off the front foot towards long on
Hauritz to Salman Butt, 1 run Butt sweeps, and connects, gets a single to deep square leg
McKay to Salman Butt, FOUR runs slapped! Butt makes room and comes down the track, he swings his bat hard and launches the ball over extra cover
McKay to Salman Butt, no run this time the ball is closer to him and he dabs it towards the fielder at slip, he was looking for third man
McKay to Salman Butt, FOUR runs shot! Butt makes room again and, though the length is shorter, Butt flat-bats the ball high over mid off for a one-bounce four
McKay to Salman Butt, FOUR runs another one! Poor line on leg stump and Butt plays a deft leg glance to the fine-leg boundary, he's taken the pressure off now
McKay to Salman Butt, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, Butt guides the ball towards third man
McKay to Younis, 1 run full ball outside off, Younis drives through cover to retain strike
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run Younis gets down on one knee to sweep but doesn't connect properly, he gets a top edge towards short fine leg
Hauritz to Salman Butt, no run Hauritz goes round the wicket and bowls a flat one on off, Butt defends on the off side
Hauritz to Salman Butt, 3 runs Butt charges the spinner and lofts the ball high over mid-on, he hasn't hit it well enough to reach the boundary though
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run played off the back foot through cover point for a single
Hauritz to Salman Butt, 1 run played off the pads through square leg for a single
Hauritz to Younis, no run bowled quicker through the air on off stump, defended on the back foot
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run short of a length and wide outside off stump, Butt has a really hard slash at it but doesn't connect

Bollinger to Salman Butt, OUT Bollinger's done it! Another shortish ball but it wasn't short enough to pull, Butt went for it anyway and top-edged it, Haddin took a second or two to pick up where the ball was going, he then turned around, ran back a few paces and held on to the catch
Bollinger to Younis, no run defended on the back foot towards the bowler
Bollinger to Younis, no run dabbed off the front foot towards the off side
Bollinger to Younis, 1 run short ball that gets up into Younis ribs, he plays an awkward mis-timed pull to square leg
Bollinger to Mohammad Yousuf, no run short of a length into Yousuf's body, he fends the ball down on the leg side
Hauritz to Younis, 1 wide Hauritz drifts down leg side and that's a wide, Younis tried to work it behind square but couldn't reach it
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run driven down the ground towards long on
Hauritz to Mohammad Yousuf, no run played on the leg side
Hauritz to Mohammad Yousuf, no run Yousuf works the ball towards midwicket
Hauritz to Mohammad Yousuf, 1 run this time he dabs it late and places it fine to get the single
Hauritz to Younis, no run Younis moves forward to try and play the ball towards long on, Ponting intercepts from midwicket
Hauritz to Younis, no run defended on the front foot
Bollinger to Mohammad Yousuf, 1 run full length on off stump, driven firmly off the front foot for a single to mid-off
Bollinger to Younis, 1 run nicely square driven, Younis reaches out for the ball outside off and places it past the fielder at point
Bollinger to Mohammad Yousuf, no run tight line and length on off stump, Yousuf stays in his crease and defends

Bollinger to Mohammad Yousuf, OUT bowled him!! Superb short ball from Bollinger does for Yousuf. Bollinger got the ball to rise sharply from just short of a length, Yousuf jumped up to defend it, he got bat to ball but the ball bounced behind him and he watched it bounce on to the top of the stumps and dislodge the bails, I wonder why he d
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, no run 144 kmh, defended on the off side from the crease
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, no run snorter, absolute snorter! Bollinger digs in another short one and has Akmal trying to get out of the way in a tearing hurry
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run played off the back foot behind square on the off side
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs the length is a bit short and Akmal goes back to cut to deep point
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs Akmal pushes forward tentatively to a flighted delivery and gets an edge past Clarke at first slip
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs Akmal rocks back to pull one that isn't too short but manages to hit it past midwicket
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs a touch shorter outside off and Akmal cuts the ball really hard behind point, Akmal's dealing in twos here

Hauritz to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs shot! Risky though! Akmal played the latest of dabs, virtually taking the ball out of Haddin's gloves, and placing it so fine that third man had zero chance of stopping that
McKay to Younis, no run played off the back foot towards the leg side, Younis seemed to want a run! Akmal sent him back
McKay to Younis, 1 run short ball outside off stump, Younis stays in his crease and hits the ball over cover point
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run Akmal moves a touch towards the off side, McKay responds with a bouncer and Akmal has to let it go
McKay to Umar Akmal, 1 wide another short ball but this time it's down leg side and that's a wide
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run short of a length on off stump, Akmal gets behind the line and blocks
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run oh that's wide outside off stump and Akmal chases it without moving his feet and gets beaten
McKay to Umar Akmal, 1 run Akmal plays the ball towards the vacant space at midwicket and calls for the single, McKay has to run across to field
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs he's played that late cut again, the ball was nearly past him when he brought the bat down to place it super fine, the fielder gave chase but couldn't stop it
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 1 run cut off the back foot to deep point
Hauritz to Younis, FOUR runs Younis has broken free! He gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps the ball from outside off stump towards the gap on the deep midwicket boundary
Hauritz to Younis, no run played back to the bowler on the front foot
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run nudged off the pads towards the leg side

Hauritz to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs not that short, not that short at all, but Akmal goes right back and heaves the ball over midwicket, he's hit it in the gap as well, there's always something happening when he faces up to Hauritz!
McKay to Younis, 1 run Younis plays the ball towards third man for a single
McKay to Umar Akmal, 1 run short ball outside off stump, Younis rides the bounce and guides the ball towards third man
McKay to Younis, no run defended from the crease towards the off side

McKay to Younis, no run edged but it falls short! Younis pushes away from his body at a good length ball and gets a thick outside edge, the ball begins to die as it reaches Ponting, he dives forward but it still falls short
McKay to Younis, no run what happened there! Younis tried to pull a short ball, the bat turned in his hand and he got no timing at all, the ball lobbed in the air and fell well short of mid-off
McKay to Younis, no run driven off the front foot towards mid off
Siddle to Umar Akmal, no run full ball, nearly a yorker, Akmal defends but not very well
Siddle to Umar Akmal, no run short of a length just outside off stump, defended on the back foot
Siddle to Umar Akmal, no run Akmal stays in his crease and plays a good length delivery on the off side
Siddle to Umar Akmal, no run the slower yorker, 122.5kmh, Akmal was beaten, well and truly, luckily for him the line was just outside off
Siddle to Umar Akmal, no run short of a length and very close to the body, Akmal tried to cut but has no room whatsoever
Siddle to Umar Akmal, no run terrific over from Siddle, a maiden, the last ball is a full one and Akmal plays it from his crease to mid off
McKay to Younis, 1 run good length ball outside off stump, pushed towards cover for a single
McKay to Umar Akmal, OUT edged and gone! Akmal has been troubled when the length is shorter and now he slashes at a short and wide one from McKay and Haddin takes an easy catch
McKay to Malik, no run good length on off stump, defended on the off side
McKay to Malik, no run fuller length outside off, Malik drives to mid-off
McKay to Malik, no run beaten! McKay pitches around off and gets the ball to shape away from Malik ever so slightly, opening him up
McKay to Malik, FOUR runs short and wide outside off stump, Malik barely moves his feet but he gives the ball a fearful crack and sends it racing to the backward point boundary
Clarke to Younis, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long off
Clarke to Malik, no run Malik strides forward and defends
Clarke to Malik, 1 run played off the pads behind square, they run a single
Clarke to Younis, no run Younis backs away and plays the ball from his stumps towards point
Clarke to Younis, 1 run the paddle sweep and Younis has placed this fine
Clarke to Malik, 1 run a full toss on off stump, Malik drives to long off
Hussey to Malik, no run driven off the front foot back to the bowler
Hussey to Malik, 1 wide wide ball, Malik went for the cut and missed, he lost balance and fell in his crease
Hussey to Malik, 1 run driven down the ground for one

Hussey to Younis, no run Younis tries to blast one down the ground but misses, Haddin whips off the bails, the third umpire is called for ... this is super close, his foot was outside the line but it moves back towards it as Haddin breaks the bails, it's really really close, it might be on the line, a fraction of a fraction might be behind
Hussey to Younis, 1 run Younis stays in his crease and dabs the ball late towards third man
Hussey to Malik, no run driven off the front foot towards the bowler, Hussey dives and fields
Hussey to Malik, 1 run played off the back foot towards mid off
Clarke to Malik, no run played to midwicket
Clarke to Malik, 2 runs Malik gets down on one knee and sweeps towards deep backward square leg
Clarke to Malik, 1 run Malik reaches out for it and plays to cover
Clarke to Younis, no run
Clarke to Younis, 1 run pulled towards deep backward square leg for a single
Clarke to Malik, no run defended back to the bowler
Hussey to Younis, no run full ball on off stump, driven off the front foot to point where Clarke fields
Hussey to Younis, 1 run pushed off the front foot to mid off
Hussey to Malik, 2 runs full ball outside off stump, Malik brings his bat down and chops it past point
Hussey to Malik, 2 runs Malik drives a length delivery through the gap at cover
Hussey to Malik, 1 run good length ball outside off, driven off the front foot through cover point
Hussey to Younis, 2 runs wide ball outside off stump, Younis reaches out for it and lofts over extra cover
Bollinger to Malik, 1 run low full toss on the off, driven firmly but straight to mid-off
Bollinger to Younis, no run short of a good length outside off, guided to point off the back foot
Bollinger to Younis, 1 run length delivery on the off, pushed through the line to mid-off for a single
Bollinger to Malik, 1 run short outside off, cut away down towards third man for a single
Bollinger to Younis, 1 run pushed it fuller on the off, driven back to the bowler who fumbles, allows a single and lets out a cry in frustration
Bollinger to Malik, FOUR runs more agony for Bollinger who slides one full outside off, goes at it hard, gets a thick outside edge and it races away to the third-man boundary
Watson to Younis, 1 run full outside off, driven wide of cover for a single into the deep
Watson to Malik, 1 run sliced away towards third man for a single
Watson to Younis, 1 run short of a good length on the off, drops it in front of cover and steals a single
Watson to Malik, no run short of a length outside off, goes for the cut but can't connect
Watson to Malik, no run bangs it short on middle, drops it off the back foot in front of cover
Watson to Malik, no run hurled it short on leg stump, moves well across to play it fine, misses, the umpre doesn't call it a wide
Bollinger to Younis, 2 runs
Bollinger to Younis, no run
Bollinger to Younis, 1 run shortish on leg stump, tries to tickle it into the leg side, clips the pads and he gets the single
Bollinger to Malik, 1 run short of a length on the off, knocked down into the off side for a single
Bollinger to Younis, no run bowled it full on the off, Younis drives it towards mid-off, there's no single on offer
Bollinger to Younis, no run
Watson to Malik, 1 run pushed down the ground towards long-on for a single
Watson to Younis, 1 run worked away into the leg side through square leg
Watson to Malik, no run bowled it on a good length on the off, driven through the line back to the bowler
Watson to Malik, 1 run quick single taken, dropped it short on the off and scampered through for a run in front of Clarke at point
Watson to Younis, no run tight line, bowls it on a good length on the off, defended towards cover, they need to get a move-on now
Watson to Younis, 1 run bowled it short on the off, makes way and guides it uppishly towards third man who collects it on the bounce and keeps them down to a single
Hauritz to Younis, 2 runs bowled it full outside off, comes down the track and tries to work it to leg, ends up getting a leading edge wide of cover for a couple
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run short of a length outside off, chops it wide of point for a single
Hauritz to Malik, no run shortish on middle, punched off the back foot towards midwicket
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run gets it past a diving Ponting this time for a single to long-on
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run bowled it short outside off, makes room to cut it away down towards point for a single
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run went straight on, short outside off, opened the face to play it behind point this time for one more
Watson to Malik, OUT Pakistan lose their fifth, similar dismissal to that of Umar Akmal, it's short and wide and he makes room to play a cut, gets a thick edge straight to Haddin
Watson to Afridi, 1 run fullish on middle and leg, flicked away through square leg for a single
Watson to Younis, no run full outside off, a slower one, sliced away towards point
Watson to Younis, no run short one, nipping in, drops it off the back foot in front of point, there's no run on offer there
Watson to Younis, no run follows that up with a bouncer, ducks under it easily, a touch too high but not called a wide
Watson to Younis, 2 runs short of a good length on middle, turned away behind square, just wide of fine leg, for a couple of runs
Hauritz to Afridi, 1 run Afridi steps out of the track and smashes that towards long-on on the bounce
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run swept away towards deep square leg for a single
Hauritz to Afridi, 1 run short of a length outside off, cracked from the crease towards deep point for a single
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run short on middle, pulled away to deep square leg for one more
Hauritz to Afridi, SIX runs into the stands, gave it a bit of air and he sensed a chance, charged down the track and dispatched it over long-on
Hauritz to Afridi, no run short and wide, there to cut, makes room to do exactly that but is surprised by the bounce, misses
Siddle to Younis, 1 run lands on a good length on middle, driven through the line to long-on for a single
Siddle to Afridi, no run banged in short on middle, a good timely bouncer, ducks under it
Siddle to Afridi, no run banged it short on middle, ducks under it again, the camera pans to the umpire who gives no signal
Siddle to Afridi, 1 run hurled it short on middle, shuffles and dabs it wide of midwicket and races for a single, Ponting picks and aims at the stumps at the non-striker's end but Afridi has made it
Siddle to Younis, 1 run dropped, Younis gets a reprieve, short outside off, guided straight to third man where Hauritz, moving forward, spills it despite covering pretty good ground
Siddle to Afridi, no run
McKay to Younis, OUT and he strikes immediately, short on the off stump and Younis goes for the pull, sends it straight into the palms of Shaun Marsh running in from deep square leg, judged it well
McKay to Afridi, (no ball) slower one, ends up being a full toss and above waist height, paddles it to short fine, a no-ball's called
McKay to Afridi, FOUR runs short of a length outside off, cut away hard behind point, the field is up and he finds the gap, four to the score
McKay to Afridi, 1 run short of a good length on the off, dabs it into the leg side and sneaks a single
McKay to Amir, OUT edged and gone, Aamer has edged it straight to Haddin, in the channel outside off and he simply pokes at it, gets a thin nick, tame dismissal
McKay to Naved-ul-Hasan, FOUR runs starts with a four, it's full outside off and he pushes at it, it works for it yields an outside edge to beat third man to the ropes
McKay to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run short of a good length outside off, guided to point off the front foot, no single there
Siddle to Afridi, SIX runs that's bludgeoned into the stands, drops in a short delivery and he makes way to club it over deep midwicket, powerful strike and a spectator in the stands cannot hold on
Siddle to Afridi, FOUR runs four more, short again and he tries to pull it square this time, gets a top edge to beat Haddin's leap, just what Pakistan need

Siddle to Afridi, 3 runs length delivery outside off, makes room and tries to cart it over cover, doesn't get enough bat on it but such is his strength that he manages to almost get it to the ropes, three more
Siddle to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run bowled it full outside off, pushed it with an angled bat towards point
Siddle to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run another dot ball, short of a good length and he wants to give Afridi the strike, trying to nudge it to third man but makes no contact
Siddle to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run three in a row, fullish on the off, pushed off the front foot to cover, decides against the single, good comeback after the early treatment
McKay to Afridi, 2 runs slower one bowled on a good length on the off, shuffles across and turns it away wristily behind square leg for a couple
McKay to Afridi, no run slower one bowled short on the off, makes room to dismiss him over mid-off, doesn't pick the slower one, misses
McKay to Afridi, FOUR runs picks it this time, short down the leg side, shuffles and chips it over short fine leg to the fine-leg boundary
McKay to Afridi, FOUR runs another one, slower ball but it's short and wide, makes room to play the cut, gets a thick outside edge over point and short third man for another boundary
McKay to Afridi, FOUR runs poor McKay, good length on middle and off, makes room to smash him through cover, gets a thick outside edge again, well side of the keeper for four more

McKay to Afridi, 4 leg byes Afridi has turned it around in a matter of a few deliveries, shuffles across, it's full on leg stump and he tries to clip it fine, gets bat to it as well as pad and it races down the fine-leg boundary, the umpire calls it leg byes even but Pakistan will take it
Watson to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run bowled it short outside off, cut away down towards third man for a single
Watson to Afridi, no run slower one bowled short on the off, mistimes a pull to midwicket

Watson to Afridi, no run too wide and a full toss, Afridi makes room to crack it wide of point, was above the waist but it wasn't called, got a faint touch to it oxn the way to the keeper on the bounce
Watson to Afridi, no run
Watson to Afridi, SIX runs punished, full toss, a gift delivery under the circumstances, makes room and smashes it into the stands over long-on, flat hit

Watson to Afridi, OUT Watson gets him with a short one, banged it in on the off stump and he tried to clear deep midwicket with a pull but didn't have much on this one, Hussey was perfectly positioned and took it comfortably
Bollinger to Ajmal, no run full outside off, driven to cover
Bollinger to Ajmal, 1 run short of a length on the off, drops it in front of cover and steals a quick single, had White aim accurately at the non-striker's end, we would have had a wicket
Bollinger to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run short outside off, slapped straight to extra cover
Bollinger to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run yorker length on middle, digs it out wide of midwicket for a single
Bollinger to Ajmal, no run hurled it full outside off, cracked straight to extra cover
Bollinger to Ajmal, no run full and he only manages to squeeze it to point, good over
Watson to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run short of a length on middle, comes down the track to play it past midwicket, strikes the helmet on its way to Haddin
Watson to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run a desperate swing amid a thirst for runs at the death, is lucky to get away, he gets hardly anything on it and it lands safe in front of mid-on and mid-off
Watson to Ajmal, 1 run pushed into the off side towards cover for a single
Watson to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run low full toss on the off, drags it along the ground towards long-on for a single
Watson to Ajmal, no run bowled it short on middle, walks across to paddle it fine, misses, quite predictably

Watson to Ajmal, OUT his eyes lit up as it landed on a length and he struck it fairly well too but straight down long-on's throat, didn't get the elevation he wanted, Watson's taken four, his best figures in ODIs
Bollinger to Mohammad Asif, no run full toss on middle, played back to the bowler
Bollinger to Mohammad Asif, no run hurls it full outside off, reaches to play it past point, straight through to the keeper
Bollinger to Mohammad Asif, no run lands on a good length outside off, pushed off the front foot to extra cover

Bollinger to Mohammad Asif, OUT run out, Pakistan are bowled out, short on middle, goes for the pull, hits him on the arm and lobs up to slip, appeal for a caught behind turned down but they decide to go through with the run and Ponting scores a direct hit at the non-striker's end to find Asif short

Pakistan have much to thank Afridi for, as his late surge took them to a target that should test the Australians. Still, it's a good pitch to bat on but also has its share of advantages for seamers which Aamer, Asif and Naved will look to exploit early in the innings to put some pressure on Australia. Join us in a little over half-an-hour for the
We are ready for the chase. Asif will bowl to Watson
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run bowls it on a good length outside off and gets it to move away, Watson lets it be
Mohammad Asif to Watson, 2 runs short and wide and it's cut away hard wide of third man, Ajmal, moving to his right, fumbles and allows them to come back for the second
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run lands it on a good length on the off, defended on the pitch solidly
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run bowls it in the channel outside off, appears to hold its line, leaves it alone
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run lands on a good length on the off, gets forward and drops it in front of cover
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run tight line outside off, trying to tempt him to drive but Watson is restrained, leaving it alone
Amir to Marsh, no run short of a length outside off, moving away and lets it go
Amir to Marsh, no run slightly short again, in the corridor outside off, shoulders arms to that one
Amir to Marsh, 1 run back of a length outside off, cut down towards third man for a single to get off the mark
Amir to Watson, 1 run fired it at 141.6 kmph on middle and leg, worked away down towards fine leg for a single
Amir to Marsh, no run shortish on the off, gets back and taps it towards cover
Amir to Marsh, no run hurls it on a good length on middle, gets across and knocks it down into the leg side
Mohammad Asif to Watson, 1 run short of a length, cuts it away hard towards third man for a single
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, FOUR runs angling it down the pads and Marsh deals with it well, flicking it away wide of fine leg for Australia's first boundary
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run lands on a good length outside off and shoots away to beat the outside edge as he gets back to defend
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run shortish on leg stump, dabbed it into the leg side in front of midwicket
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 1 run closes the face on that one to work it away behind square for a single

Amir to Watson, no run bowled it short outside off, left it alone to the keeper
Amir to Watson, 5 wide wayward delivery, bowled at 142 kmph way down he leg side and there was no way Kamran Akmal could have got to that one, five wides
Amir to Watson, no run excellent pace, 145 kmph and nips back in sharply, Watson reacts late but does well enough to keep that one away from his pads, chopping it behind point
Amir to Ponting, no run ooh, that must hurt, Aamer's in a fiery mood here, short of a good length and nips back in, 143.8 kmph, struck him hard on the stomach
Amir to Ponting, no run shortish on middle and leg again, moves across to work it away, strikes him high on the pad
Amir to Ponting, 1 run short of a good length on the off, dropped it in front of point for a quick single
Mohammad Asif to Ponting, 1 wide a touch too wide there, a driving length but out of the batsman's reach
Mohammad Asif to Ponting, no run short of a good length outside off, moving away, bowled at 138 kmph, leaves it be
Mohammad Asif to Ponting, no run slightly short on the off, defended off the back foot in front of cover

Mohammad Asif to Ponting, no run targeting middle and off, Ponting got a stride froward and tried to defend but the bat was a long way away and it struck him on the pads as it nipped back in, struck him in line, appeal for lbw turned down, replays suggest it would have just clipped the bails, enough doubt there
Mohammad Asif to Ponting, 2 runs cut away past point wide of third man for a couple of runs
Mohammad Asif to Ponting, 2 runs short of a length outside off, gets on the back foot and cracks it wide of point for two more into the deep
Mohammad Asif to Ponting, no run bowled it short on the off, rocks back and taps it towards cover

Amir to Marsh, no run bowled at 141.9 kmph, excellent bounce and carry to the keeper as it beat the outside edge there, bowled it from wide of the crease and Marsh defended it inside the line
Amir to Marsh, no run bowled it short on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it to cover
Amir to Marsh, 1 run short of a length outside off, chops it towards point for a single
Amir to Ponting, no run short of a length on middle, dropped into the leg side off the back foot
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run lands it on a good length on the off, defended towards cover

Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run a testing length outside off, moving away and Marsh offers no shot

Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 2 runs bowling it on a length on middle, flicked away through square leg, Ajmal covers some ground to cut it off from fine leg, running to his right, but he managed to drag it in
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run sweetly timed, bowled it full on the off, driven through the line back onto the stumps at the non-striker's end
Amir to Ponting, no run short of a length on the off, punched off the back foot towards cover
Amir to Ponting, 1 run targeting middle and leg, moves across and whips it uppishly over square leg, didn't get hold of it but managed to clear the fielder

Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 4 leg byes poor delivery, sliding it on the pads and it brushes them as he tries to clip it fine, beats fine leg to the ropes, given runs
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, FOUR runs elegantly done, pitched up outside off, steps forward and leans into the drive to place it between point and cover to the ropes
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run bowled on a length on the off, drives it cleanly but straight to mid-off
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run gets forward and pushes it through to mid-on
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run leaving the right hander there, pitched it up but Clarke allowed it to sail through

Amir to Ponting, no run shorter and slower,cuts away, defended towards point
Amir to Ponting, no run he's got Ponting hopping here, short of a good length and nips back in to catch him on the pads, outside the line of the off stump

Amir to Ponting, 4 leg byes appeal for lbw, trapped on the pads in line with the stumps as it moves back in sharply but too high, a direct hit as they scamper for a single, the ball ricochets and they get an additional three
Amir to Ponting, 3 runs played this one well, came to him at the right height, whipped it away off the back foot through square leg for three more
Amir to Clarke, no run bowls it on a good length outside off, shoulders arms to let it through
Mohammad Asif to Ponting, no run short of a good length on the off, punched from the crease towards cover
Mohammad Asif to Ponting, no run inside edge onto the pads and lobs up straight to where short leg would be, hardly any foot movement as he tries to push it past the bowler, landed on a good length
Mohammad Asif to Ponting, no run hurled it short on the off, rocked back to defend it to cover
Mohammad Asif to Ponting, no run short of a good length outside off, punched towards cover
Mohammad Asif to Ponting, no run drops it short on the off, pushed through towards point

Mohammad Asif to Ponting, no run another inside edge onto the pads and this time he was lucky it didn't roll onto the stumps, pushed it fuller did Asif and Ponting tried to drive it through the line and again with uncertain foot movement

Naved-ul-Hasan to White, FOUR runs shot! Aims for another yorker and overpitches, White just puts that away with immense power between midwicket and mid-on, lots of wrist in that shot
Naved-ul-Hasan to White, 1 run great innings, Cameron White! Works the ball off his pads past midwicket and runs across to celebrate his ton, up goes the bat and he gets a hug from Hussey
Amir to White, 1 run length ball on middle and off, dabs it with soft hands in front of cover
Amir to Hussey, no run another length ball, slants in, Hussey pushes it straight to cover
Amir to Hussey, 1 wide short ball down the pads, swings and cannot connect, Aamer falls down after bowling the ball
Amir to Hussey, 4 byes slower ball outside off, tries to swing it over midwicket, misses, and then Kamran misses too
Amir to Hussey, 2 runs works a short of a length ball across his stumps for two
Amir to Hussey, 2 runs too straight, clipped out to Umar in the deep for two more
Amir to Hussey, no run length ball outside off, pushes at it, gets an inside edge to leg
Naved-ul-Hasan to White, FOUR runs slower ball, aims for middle and off, White gets under it plays a wonderful flick-lap over midwicket, superbly pulled off and placed wide of the catchers
Naved-ul-Hasan to Haddin, 1 run pitched up, driven back on the volley, Naved sticks out his left hand to try and stop it but cannot prevent the single
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, no run and straight he is, on middle and off and Hussey can only defend

Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, 3 runs fuller ball and Hussey swings it across the line, timing it pretty well, not a perfectly played mow but he picks the gap at midwicket and gets three, giving the sweeper plenty of running to do
Naved-ul-Hasan to Haddin, 3 runs looks to drive this length ball down the ground but the lack of footwork draws a thick outside edge into the spaces behind backward point
Amir to Haddin, 1 run on the stumps and bunted down to long-on
Amir to Hussey, no run back of a length, angles in, he tucks it off his pads and sets off for the risky single and has to put in a dive as Aamer runs and releases the throw
Amir to Hussey, 1 run length again, Hussey uses the wrists to nudge it past square leg
Amir to Haddin, no run short ball, Haddin backs away and tries to uppercut but is in no position to do that and misses out
Amir to Haddin, no run well bowled, short of a length and Haddin jumps back to defend
Amir to Haddin, 1 run back of a length outside the pads and he works the ball to leg
Ajmal to Haddin, 1 run flat on middle and leg, he turns it off his pads to square
Ajmal to Hussey, no run tossed up on a length, Hussey drives, cover dives and saves runs
Ajmal to Hussey, FOUR runs sees a bit of air on the ball and opens the face, driving in the air between cover and point and that's the end of the game
That's all we have for you. Do join us for the second game which is on Sunday. Thanks for your company and we look forward to bringing you the coverage for the Sydney game. Bye for now!

Hussey pumps his fist as he runs across. Another not out for him. Australia go up 1-0 with a clinical run chase. Superb effort from White. Should be the Man of the Match, I'd say. Afridi's big hitting late in the Pakistan innings helped the tourists set Australia a target of 275 but they won with five wickets and nine deliveries in hand. White pa
Australia won by 5 wickets (with 9 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Cameron White, AUS
